title: Asking for Help & Small Complaints
description: Learn polite A2+ help requests and mild complaints.

steps.teacher: 不好意思，你可以幫我一下嗎？
expected_answer: 不好意思，你可以幫我一下嗎？
steps.pinyin: bù hǎo yì si, nǐ kě yǐ bāng wǒ yí xià ma?
steps.english_hint: Excuse me, can you help me?

steps.teacher: 這裡的網路好像不太穩定。
expected_answer: 這裡的網路好像不太穩定。
steps.pinyin: zhè lǐ de wǎng lù hǎo xiàng bú tài wěn dìng.

steps.teacher: 我的房卡不能用，可以幫我看一下嗎？
expected_answer: 我的房卡不能用，可以幫我看一下嗎？
steps.pinyin: wǒ de fáng kǎ bù néng yòng, kě yǐ bāng wǒ kàn yí xià ma?
steps.english_hint: My room card doesn't work, can you check it?

steps.teacher: 空調有點太冷了，可以調高一點嗎？
expected_answer: 空調有點太冷了，可以調高一點嗎？
steps.pinyin: kōng tiáo yǒu diǎn tài lěng le, kě yǐ tiáo gāo yì diǎn ma?
steps.english_hint: The AC is too cold, can you turn it up?

steps.teacher: 我找不到路，你可以告訴我方向嗎？
expected_answer: 我找不到路，你可以告訴我方向嗎？
steps.pinyin: wǒ zhǎo bú dào lù, nǐ kě yǐ gào sù wǒ fāng xiàng ma?
steps.english_hint: I can't find the way, can you tell me the direction?

steps.pinyin: wǒ jué dé yǒu diǎn tài chǎo le.
steps.english_hint: I feel it's a bit too noisy.

steps.teacher: 可以幫我換一個位置嗎？
expected_answer: 可以幫我換一個位置嗎？
steps.pinyin: kě yǐ bāng wǒ huàn yí gè wèi zhì ma?

steps.teacher: 我的手機快沒電了，有插座嗎？
expected_answer: 我的手機快沒電了，有插座嗎？
steps.pinyin: wǒ de shǒu jī kuài méi diàn le, yǒu chā zuò ma?
steps.english_hint: My phone is low on battery; is there a socket?

steps.teacher: 我聽不太清楚，可以再說一次嗎？
expected_answer: 我聽不太清楚，可以再說一次嗎？
steps.pinyin: wǒ tīng bú tài qīng chǔ, kě yǐ zài shuō yí cì ma?
steps.english_hint: I can't hear clearly; can you say it again?

steps.teacher: 抱歉，我不太懂，可以換一種說法嗎？
expected_answer: 抱歉，我不太懂，可以換一種說法嗎？
steps.pinyin: bào qiàn, wǒ bú tài dǒng, kě yǐ huàn yì zhǒng shuō fǎ ma?
steps.english_hint: Sorry, I don't quite understand. Can you say it differently?

review.summary: You learned polite A2+ help & complaint sentences.
